tasks.description: Explore potential applications for AI to augment our team's support and external communications.
Develop new processes to help awareness of Gestalt once they've shipped.
Create education sessions to up-level design craft skills on all things design systems.

tasks.task: Gestalt docs auto-generation of props tables
tasks.description: Finalize our migration of component docs to dynamically generate props tables in our documentation.

tasks.task: Gestalt docs Sandpack code editor migrations
tasks.description: Finalize all remaining code samples to render in Sandpack for improved rendering and text selection.
Include official guidelines / best practices on right-to-left content within Gestalt's docs.
Implement updates and additions to our notification guidelines (currently known as messaging) to support new use cases and fill in missing topics.
Publish refinements to our Gestalt Figma libraries to make finding the desired component faster and less burdensome.

tasks.task: Figma component parity with Web codebase
tasks.description: Address naming / property gaps in our Figma Web library to better align with our Web component codebase.

tasks.task: Integration of variables into Gestalt Figma libraries
tasks.description: Research and experimentation on the viability of implementing Figma variables into Gestalt's Figma libraries.
Implementation of Bar and Line chart components in our Web codebase.
Implementation of a baseline density theme across a subset of Web components.
Provide greater fidelity and detail related to Gestalt's animation guidelines.
Address the root causes related to number web Popover stability issues.

tasks.task: Pinterest Design Figma plugin experience improvements
tasks.description: Improve existing features in our Figma plugin to better support the day-to-day workflow of designers.

tasks.task: Pinterest Design Figma plugin linter functionality
tasks.description: Implement design linting capabilities to detect and fix missing Gestalt styles/variables in design files.

tasks.task: Pinterest Design Figma plugin color module
tasks.description: Provide more in-depth plugin support for creating accessible color combinations with Gestalt's color palette.
Enhance ouf mobile component documentation to improve clarity while streamlining the creation process.

tasks.task: Integration / linking of PyDocs for internal employees
tasks.description: Connect Gestalt's external docs with private links to internal documentation to help engineers get to pertinent information faster / easier.

tasks.task: Integration of educational content to Gestalt's documentation
tasks.description: Add all new / existing educational content to Gestalt's documentation to help design and engineering find educational content faster / easier.

tasks.task: Implementation of an external Gestalt contribution model
tasks.description: Build out the infrastructure and processes necessary to support an external contribution process from designers and engineers outside of Gestalt.

tasks.task: Support context logging within Gestalt components
tasks.description: Develop an API that supports logging functionality within Gestalt components.

tasks.task: Support data test ids within Gestalt components
tasks.description: Increment testing support across Gestalt components using data test ids.
Explore the possibility to measure usage of Gestalt components through the lens of impressions.
Implementation of Gestalt's official illustrations in Web component form.
Improvements to the overall component, including: ability to collapse/expand the entire column, ability to collapse/expand sections and potential support for subtext, images and avatars
Buildout of the new standard Pinterest mobile ActionBar component.

tasks.task: R&D: CSS Container queries within Gestalt Web components
tasks.description: Explore how to leverage CSS container queries for a more responsive Gestalt.
